entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:50 a.m. PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 16.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 12:00 AM PDT Friday 5 May 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 16.0°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: 5.1°C
Wind: NNW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then clear. Risk of thunderstorms early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h except gusting to 70 near thunderstorms early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near thunderstorms late in the afternoon. High 25. Humidex 26. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
